Articles.Content:
(Not the... you, know, illegal kind )

I'll be staying up pretty late tonight doing some U.S. History... ah, work. (There's a better word )

And, as the title suggests, that's what'll be keeping me going.

But this is the first time in my entire school experience that I've been up past, say, 10:30 PM doing homework. Most people I know seem to do so every day.

Is my case really that unusual? (Have you ever done this before?)

But this is the first time in my entire school experience that I've been up past, say, 10:30 PM doing homework. Most people I know seem to do so every day.

Is my case really that unusual?

That depends on how old you are.

(Have you ever done this before?)

Many times. Of course, in college I was more or less nocturnal.
By the way, i think the rules here are that if you're under 18 you shouldn't reveal your age here.
Well, in university you might sometimes work much much longer ... maybe even stay up through the night, till the next day

Well, in university you might sometimes work much much longer ... maybe even stay up through the night, till the next day

Foresight and judgment make long nights few.

-Duxwing

Foresight and judgment make long nights few.

-Duxwing

Indeed, and that is why I don't normally have this problem.
There are days that the only thing keeping me going to plenty of rockstar and redbull.
